describe: Paraguay is a landlocked country in the heart of South America, known for its rich cultural heritage, vibrant traditions, and diverse landscapes ranging from lush forests to expansive plains.

cities.name: 🏙 Asunción
cities.geographical_location: Located on the eastern bank of the Paraguay River, Asunción is the capital and largest city of Paraguay.
cities.climate: Asunción has a humid subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters.

cities.name: 🏙 Ciudad del Este
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the Paraná River, Ciudad del Este is part of the Triple Frontier with Brazil and Argentina.
cities.climate: The city experiences a humid subtropical climate with abundant rainfall throughout the year.

cities.name: 🏝 Encarnación
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southern part of Paraguay, Encarnación lies on the Paraná River, opposite the Argentine city of Posadas.
cities.climate: Encarnación has a humid subtropical climate with warm summers and mild winters.
popular_attractions: Jesuit Missions of La Santísima Trinidad de Paraná
